channel.title: Animations?
channel.description:
well when lets say someone teleports it causes them to like repeat the animation over and over again, i did a Tut on perfect teleporting but it didn't work. as well when someone trains on the dummys, doors, it repeats the animation of them attacking the dummies, or the doors, etc. and its really annoying to some people sometimes and as well to me, well if you can help me in this problem i would surely appreciate it =)
source: it was pimpscape, then it just changed to pvpscape lol

item.title: Animations?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

i had the same problem yestrday because i changed the animy , you can change the animation by the way of what they do this is an example of mine

case 1531:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“You get strength!!!”);
actionTimer = 20;
setAnimation(0422);
addSkillXP((6999playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[3]), 3);
addItem(1050, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

case 1531:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“You get strength!!!”);
actionTimer = 20;
setAnimation(THISISTHEANIMATIONITWILLMAKEWHENUHITTHEDOOR);
addSkillXP((6999playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[3]), 3);
addItem(1050, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

hope this helped just change the example above HISISTHEANIMATIONITWILLMAKEWHENUHITTHEDOOR to what u want some of the animations wont work its not like 1-100 all work

Read full topic
